### The Lancet Voice

The Lancet Voice features interviews and discussions about the latest medical research published in The Lancet.

**RSS Feed:** [Subscribe to The Lancet](https://www.thelancet.com/rssfeed/lancet_current.xml)

```{=html}
<div id="lancet-feed" style="max-height: 400px; overflow-y: auto; border: 1px solid #ddd; padding: 10px; margin-bottom: 20px;">
<p>Loading The Lancet feed...</p>
</div>
```

```{=html}
<script>
// Function to parse and display RSS feed using RSS2JSON service
async function loadRSSFeed(feedUrl, elementId, feedName) {
  const div = document.getElementById(elementId);
  try {
    // Using rss2json.com as a CORS proxy for RSS feeds
    const apiUrl = `https://api.rss2json.com/v1/api.json?rss_url=${encodeURIComponent(feedUrl)}`;
    const response = await fetch(apiUrl);
    const data = await response.json();
    
    if (data.status === 'ok' && data.items && data.items.length > 0) {
      let html = `<h4>${data.feed.title || feedName}</h4>`;
      html += '<ul style="list-style-type: none; padding-left: 0;">';
      
      // Display up to 10 items
      data.items.slice(0, 10).forEach(item => {
        const date = new Date(item.pubDate).toLocaleDateString();
        html += `
          <li style="margin-bottom: 15px; padding-bottom: 15px; border-bottom: 1px solid #eee;">
            <strong><a href="${item.link}" target="_blank">${item.title}</a></strong><br/>
            <small style="color: #666;">${date}</small>
            ${item.description ? `<p style="margin-top: 5px;">${item.description.substring(0, 200)}...</p>` : ''}
          </li>
        `;
      });
      
      html += '</ul>';
      div.innerHTML = html;
    } else {
      div.innerHTML = `<p>Unable to load ${feedName} feed. Please visit the <a href="${feedUrl}" target="_blank">direct RSS feed</a>.</p>`;
    }
  } catch (error) {
    console.error(`Error loading ${feedName} feed:`, error);
    div.innerHTML = `<p>Error loading feed. Please visit the <a href="${feedUrl}" target="_blank">direct RSS feed</a>.</p>`;
  }
}

// Load feeds when page loads
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  loadRSSFeed('https://www.nature.com/nature/articles?type=nature-podcast.rss', 'nature-feed', 'Nature Podcast');
  loadRSSFeed('https://www.science.org/rss/podcast.xml', 'science-feed', 'Science Podcast');
  loadRSSFeed('https://www.thelancet.com/rssfeed/lancet_current.xml', 'lancet-feed', 'The Lancet');
});
</script>
```
